name: ds-binomial-frequency-chart
description: A custom visualisation chart for use in Data Studio

scripts.concat: cat dscc.min.js > viz.js; echo >> viz.js; cat chartSource.js >> viz.js
scripts.upload: gsutil cp -a public-read manifest.json gs://ds-binomial-frequency-chart; gsutil cp -a public-read viz.* gs://ds-binomial-frequency-chart; gsutil cp -a public-read config.json gs://ds-binomial-frequency-chart
scripts.build: npm run concat; npm run upload

author: Jonathon Broughton - @jsdbroughton
